revised_title: Rectification of Conic Sections: Focusing on Hyperbolas
tldr: The author, John Hellins, presents a comprehensive study on the rectification of hyperbolas, focusing on the methods of fluxions. He investigates nine theorems and discusses the series that apply to this curve. Hellins also provides examples and corrects an error in the length of a large arch of an equilateral hyperbola. He critiques previous works and highlights the limitations of other methods for rectification.
